title: [GAMEPLAY] Blood Moon Twisted Fate Home Teleport Bug

embed.description: League of Legends Blood Moon Twisted Fate Skin Spotlight. Shows off Animations and Ability Effects of Twisted Fate on their Blood Moon Skin in this Spotlight. All footage was taken in game.

body:
Hi Riot!

I noticed TF {{champion:4}} when teleporting home, the animation of him walking through the portal seems like he is walking with his same feet and hands. 

I hope you can fix that by changing the animation.
Please like this post up so Riot can see this!

Thanks!

replies.body: Hiya!  Thanks for the report! I spoke with the animator on this one, and the animation, as it stands, is working as intended.
Yes, but only after looking for it.
